title: The Intelligence - “Illegal, unregulated and unreported fishing may account for over $30bn-worth”—how to stop it?
summary:
Also on the daily podcast: how millennial investors are changing finance and Berlin’s new airport, nine years delayed“Illegal, unregulated and unreported fishing may account for over $30bn-worth”—how to stop it?
THE STAGGERING extent of illegal fishing, and its human and environmental costs, are only just becoming clear.
The old guard likes to mock millennial investors, but they’re changing finance, possibly for the better.
And as Berlin’s shiny new airport opens we ask: why is it nine years late?
Runtime: 21minListen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google | Stitcher | TuneInFor full access to print, digital and audio editions of The Economist, subscribe here www.economist.com/intelligenceoffer
paragraphs: Also on the daily podcast: how millennial investors are changing finance and Berlin’s new airport, nine years delayed
“Illegal, unregulated and unreported fishing may account for over $30bn-worth”—how to stop it?

THE STAGGERING extent of illegal fishing, and its human and environmental costs, are only just becoming clear. We ask how to put a shadowy industry on a more even keel. The old guard likes to mock millennial investors, but they’re changing finance, possibly for the better. And as Berlin’s shiny new airport opens we ask: why is it nine years late? Runtime: 21min
Listen on: Apple Podcasts | Spotify | Google | Stitcher | TuneIn
